myself.translation[0].definitions[0].def: used by the person speaking or writing to show that they are affected by their own action
myself.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: I blame myself for what has happened.
myself.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Why do I always have to do everything myself?
They say it’s a beautiful place, but I myself have never been there.
myself.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: No one is to blame except myself.
